scripts.watch: npm run clean && parallelshell 'npm run watch:lint' 'npm run watch:js'
scripts.watch:js: mkdir -p dist && watchify src/index.js -vd -t browserify-shim -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] -t brfs -s HorizontalScroll -o dist/index.js
scripts.build: npm run build:lint && npm run clean && npm run build:js && npm run build:uglify
scripts.build:js: mkdir dist && browserify src/index.js -d -t browserify-shim -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] -t brfs -t [ uglifyify -x .js ] -s HorizontalScroll | exorcist dist/index.js.map > dist/index.js
scripts.build:uglify: uglifyjs -cm --in-source-map dist/index.js.map --source-map dist/index.js.map --source-map-url index.js.map -o dist/index.js dist/index.js
